caption.p: Antimicrobial activity of 54 endophytic actinomycetes on indicated fungal and bacterial strains.

attrib.italic: Antifungal activity: inhibition zone width < 3 mm: “–”means negative (3.00–10.00) mm; “ + ”means weak (10.00–15.00) mm; “ + + ”means medium ≥15 mm; “ + + + ”means strong; antibacterial activity: inhibition zone width < 0 mm; “–”means negative (0.00–5.00) mm; “ + ”means weak (5.00–10.00) mm; “ + + ”means medium (10.00–15.00) mm: “ + + + ” means strong.
